sourceApplicationName.title: Source Application Name
sourceApplicationName.description: The official name of the application or system that will be sending data or files
sourceApplicationName.requirements: Use the formal system name as known in your organization

targetApplicationName.title: Target Application Name
targetApplicationName.description: The official name of the application or system that will be receiving data or files
targetApplicationName.requirements: Use the formal system name as known in your organization

isUsingIODS.title: Is using IODS?
isUsingIODS.description: Whether your current system uses the legacy IODS (Input/Output Data System) for file transfers
isUsingIODS.requirements: Select Yes if you currently use IODS, No if you don't or are unsure

iodsDetails.title: IODS Details
iodsDetails.description: Details about your existing IODS configuration (only if using IODS)

oldIodsId.title: Old IODS ID
oldIodsId.description: The unique identifier for your current IODS system
oldIodsId.requirements: Enter the exact ID as it appears in your IODS configuration

onSiteServerNames.title: On Site Server Application Names
onSiteServerNames.description: Names of the on-premises servers or applications involved in IODS transfers
onSiteServerNames.requirements: List all relevant server names, separated by commas if multiple

fileName.title: File Name
fileName.description: The typical file name pattern or specific file names used in IODS transfers
fileName.requirements: Include file extensions and any naming patterns

fileType.title: File Type
fileType.description: The format or type of files being transferred through IODS
fileType.requirements: Specify the file format and any special characteristics

iodsMailbox.title: IODS Mailbox or Drop Location Name
iodsMailbox.description: The mailbox or designated drop location name in the IODS system
iodsMailbox.requirements: Use the exact name as configured in IODS

prePostTransferProcesses.title: Pre/Post Transfer Processes
prePostTransferProcesses.description: Any automated processes that run before or after IODS file transfers
prePostTransferProcesses.requirements: Describe any validation, encryption, or notification processes

systemName.title: System Name
systemName.description: A clear, descriptive name that identifies your application system
systemName.requirements: Use a name that will be easily recognizable to stakeholders

internalOrExternal.title: Internal or External Application
internalOrExternal.description: Whether the application is developed and maintained internally or by an external vendor
internalOrExternal.requirements: Select Internal for in-house systems, External for vendor/third-party systems

supportedProtocols.title: Supported Protocols
supportedProtocols.description: The communication protocols your system can use for data transfer
supportedProtocols.requirements: List all protocols the system supports, separated by commas

platform.title: System Platform
platform.description: The underlying technology platform or infrastructure on which your system runs
platform.requirements: Specify the operating system, cloud platform, or technology stack

environments.title: Environments In Scope
environments.description: The environments where this onboarding will be implemented
environments.requirements: Select all environments that will be part of this integration

primaryRegion.title: Primary Region
primaryRegion.description: The primary geographical region where your system operates
primaryRegion.requirements: Choose the region where most of your system's processing occurs

backupRegion.title: Backup Region
backupRegion.description: The backup or disaster recovery region for your system
backupRegion.requirements: Select None if no backup region is configured

networkCloudInfo.title: Section 3: Network Boundary and Cloud Boundary

networkLocation.title: Network Location
networkLocation.description: Whether your system is hosted on-premises or in the cloud
networkLocation.requirements: Select On Site for on-premises hosting, Cloud for cloud-hosted systems

cloudDetails.title: Cloud Details
cloudDetails.description: Specific details about your cloud hosting configuration (required if Cloud is selected)

awsAccountName.title: AWS Cloud Account Name
awsAccountName.description: The friendly name of your AWS account
awsAccountName.requirements: Use the account name as it appears in AWS Organizations or your billing

awsAccountNumber.title: AWS Cloud Account Number
awsAccountNumber.requirements: Enter the exact 12-digit number without spaces or dashes

cloudRegion.title: Cloud Region Name
cloudRegion.description: The AWS region where your resources are deployed
cloudRegion.requirements: Use the full region name as it appears in AWS

awsCloudId.title: AWS Cloud ID
awsCloudId.description: Any specific cloud identifier or resource ID for your deployment
awsCloudId.requirements: Provide the specific identifier if you have one assigned

serverName.title: Server Name
serverName.description: The name or identifier of your cloud server or compute resource
serverName.requirements: Use the instance name as it appears in your cloud console

ipOrSubnet.title: IP or Subnet
ipOrSubnet.description: The IP address or subnet range for your cloud resources
ipOrSubnet.requirements: Provide either specific IP or CIDR notation for subnet
ipOrSubnet.validation: Must be valid IP address or CIDR notation

applicationTarget.title: Application Target
applicationTarget.description: The specific application endpoint or target for connections
applicationTarget.requirements: Provide the URL, hostname, or connection string for the application

requiresExternalVendorConnection.title: Requires External Vendor Connection?
requiresExternalVendorConnection.description: Whether this system needs to connect to external vendor systems or third-party services
requiresExternalVendorConnection.requirements: Select Yes if connections to external vendors are required

hasOutbound.title: Outbound Request (Cloud to On Site)?
hasOutbound.description: Whether files need to be transferred FROM the cloud TO on-premises systems
hasOutbound.requirements: Select Yes if you need to send files from cloud to on-site

sourceAwsAccount.title: Source AWS Account
sourceAwsAccount.description: The AWS account that will be the source for outbound transfers
sourceAwsAccount.requirements: Enter the account number or name for the source account

sourceBucketArn.title: Source Bucket ARN
sourceBucketArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 bucket used as the source
sourceBucketArn.requirements: Provide the complete ARN starting with arn:aws:s3:::
sourceBucketArn.validation: Must be valid S3 bucket ARN format

sourceArchiveBucket.title: Source Archive Bucket
sourceArchiveBucket.description: The S3 bucket name where source files are archived after transfer
sourceArchiveBucket.requirements: Enter the bucket name used for archiving transferred files

sourceArchivePrefix.title: Source Archive Prefix
sourceArchivePrefix.description: The folder path or prefix used in the archive bucket for organizing files
sourceArchivePrefix.requirements: Specify the prefix structure for archived files

hasInbound.title: Inbound Request (On Site to Cloud)?
hasInbound.description: Whether files need to be transferred FROM on-premises TO the cloud
hasInbound.requirements: Select Yes if you need to send files from on-site to cloud

targetBucket.title: Target Bucket
targetBucket.description: The S3 bucket name that will receive inbound files from on-premises
targetBucket.requirements: Enter the destination bucket name for incoming files

targetPrefix.title: Target Prefix
targetPrefix.description: The folder path or prefix in the target bucket where files will be stored
targetPrefix.requirements: Specify the folder structure for incoming files

customerEnvironments.title: Customer Environments In Scope
customerEnvironments.description: Detailed description of the customer environments that will be included in this onboarding
customerEnvironments.requirements: Describe all environments, their purposes, and any special considerations
examples: Development for testing, QA for validation, Production for live operations
Single production environment with blue-green deployment

cloudEnvironmentMapping.title: Cloud Environment Mapping
cloudEnvironmentMapping.description: How your customer environments map to cloud environments

development.title: DEV maps to
development.description: Which cloud environment your development environment maps to
development.requirements: Select the cloud environment that corresponds to your development setup

qualityAssurance.title: QA maps to
qualityAssurance.description: Which cloud environment your quality assurance/testing environment maps to
qualityAssurance.requirements: Select the cloud environment used for testing and validation

production.title: PROD maps to
production.description: Which cloud environment your production environment maps to
production.requirements: Select the cloud environment for live production workloads

implementationDeadline.title: Implementation Deadline
implementationDeadline.description: The target date when this onboarding implementation should be completed
implementationDeadline.requirements: Select a realistic date considering development, testing, and deployment time
implementationDeadline.validation: Must be a future date in YYYY-MM-DD format

contacts.title: Contact Information
contacts.description: Key contacts for business and technical coordination

businessContactSource.title: Business Contact (Source)
businessContactSource.description: Primary business contact for the source system or organization
businessContactSource.requirements: Provide name and email of the business owner or project manager

technicalContactSource.title: Technical Contact (Source)
technicalContactSource.description: Primary technical contact for the source system
technicalContactSource.requirements: Provide name and email of the technical lead or architect

businessContactTarget.title: Business Contact (Target)
businessContactTarget.description: Primary business contact for the target system or organization
businessContactTarget.requirements: Provide name and email of the business owner for the receiving system

technicalContactTarget.title: Technical Contact (Target)
technicalContactTarget.description: Primary technical contact for the target system
technicalContactTarget.requirements: Provide name and email of the technical lead for the receiving system

vendorContact.title: Vendor Contact (if External)
vendorContact.description: Contact information for external vendor if using third-party systems
vendorContact.requirements: Required only for external applications - provide vendor representative details
